data.title: Mary Isabelle Peters Obituary
data.meta_description: Celebrate the life of Mary Peters, leave a kind word or memory and get funeral service information care of Hainstock's Funeral Home & Crematorium.
data.text:
It is with sad hearts that we announce the passing of our mother Mary Isabelle Peters on July 11,2023 at the age of 97.

Isabelle was predeceased by her husband Richard, sister Dorothy, brother Jack, brother and sister-in-law Hartley and Margaret. Cherishing her memory are her six daughters, Cathy (Steve), Joanne, MaryJane (Ron), Diane (Paul), Sharon, Barb (Terry), 16 grandchildren, 13 great grandchildren and 2 great-great grandchildren.

Mom was a devoted Mother and Wife, and loved to spend time with the grandchildren. In retirement Mom and Dad were blessed to enjoy many winters in Palm Desert, trips to Hawaii and Europe. Mom was fortunate enough to live her last two years in Memory Care at Aster Gardens in Sherwood Park, the family would like to thank the staff for your compassion and loving care of Mama.

In lieu of flowers, donations to the Alzheimerâ€™s society Of Alberta #306,10430 61 Ave NW, Edmonton, AB, T6H 2J3 would be greatly appreciated.

Cremation has taken place and A Celebration of Life will take place Saturday July 29, 2023, at 11 am, at Hainstock's Funeral Home, 9810-34 Ave.
